summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, sent on September 16, 2010. The email contains a link to a New York Times article and includes a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be attorney-client privileged.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, which contains a link to a New York Times article and a confidentiality notice.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: The email indicates a level of confidentiality that suggests an attorney-client relationship.

keyFacts: The email was sent on September 16, 2010.
The email contains a link to a New York Times article.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
Unauthorized use or disclosure of the email is prohibited.
The email includes a request for notification in case of error in receipt.
